document_data.name: Bolt
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bolt''' was a [[goblin]] [[warlock]] and a follower of [[the Absolute]] in the [[Shattered Sanctum]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|I'd do what he says. Ain't wanna make the boss any madder 'n' he already is.|Bolt, about [[Dror Ragzlin]].}}
document_data.History: Warlock Bolt remained at the [[Shattered Sanctum]] in the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, when the leaders of the Shattered Sanctum began searching for individuals aboard a crashed [[nautiloid]] they believed were [[True Soul]]s of their goddess. Bolt witnessed the warlord [[Dror Ragzlin]] attempt to ''[[speak with dead|speak with]]'' a dead [[mind flayer]] to glean more information about their whereabouts.
